name: Super Cricket Fighter Turbo (itch)
description:
Super Cricket Fighter Turbo is Pong x WindJammer x Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo.

It's a pixelated 1v1 arcade game on a mobile device.

It has been created during a week by the Sparkling Vinegar's team as an internal game jam.

The concept was to play at two on the same device like an old fashion fighting game.

All art and animations were created with Astropad.

------------------------------------------------------------

SELECTED ARTICLES

  • "Like cricket but fun."
    - Chris Priestman, Pocket Gamer
  • "It's just not cricket."
    - Surt, Tigsource.com

------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

  • Tap to serve.
  • To control the player, just move your finger on the screen, pretty simple.
  • Tap with the good timing to make a super hit !

------------------------------------------------------------

MUSIC

A Split Second of Anarchy by National Broadcast Network
